name: Brickenoid
description:
This is a breakout clone with platform jumping mechanics.

I only had one day to spend, so there is no scores, no game over and no goals, I guess thats a feature too.

Default controls:
Arrows or a/d to move
c or left click to launch ball
space or right click to jump

Credits:

https://github.com/madeso/kenneyjam2017
